author: OWCT Bridge
title: OWCT Bridge
shortDescription: The OWCT multichain Bridge extension is the simplest, safest and cheapest way to transfer your OWCT between the One World Chain mainnet and the other three supported Blockchains. You can bridge to and from ETHEREUM, BASE or BNB Chain.
description: The OWCT multichain Bridge extension is the simplest, safest and cheapest way to transfer your OWCT between the One World Chain mainnet and the other three supported Blockchains. You can bridge to and from ETHEREUM, BASE or BNB Chain.

author: Icecream Swap
title: Icecream Swap
shortDescription: This self improving AI DEX aggregator is a verified partner of the One World Chain network. The AI powered Decentralized Exchange aggregator improves with every swap. The more you trade, the smarter and more efficient the aggregator becomes.
description: This self improving AI DEX aggregator is a verified partner of the One World Chain network. The AI powered Decentralized Exchange aggregator improves with every swap. The more you trade, the smarter and more efficient the aggregator becomes.

author: MULTISENDER
title: MULTISENDER
shortDescription: Send or Airdrop any token on the One World Chain network to thousands of wallets with just a click. To use the Multisender Dapp, you can choose to upload a csv file with all the addresses or copy and paste the addresses manually into the provided box.
description: Send or Airdrop any token on the One World Chain network to thousands of wallets with just a click. To use the Multisender Dapp, you can choose to upload a csv file with all the addresses or copy and paste the addresses manually into the provided box.

author: TOKEN CREATOR
title: TOKEN CREATOR
shortDescription: Create your own ERC20 cryptocurrency or Meme Tokens in less than a minute. Create with zero development skills by filling out a very short form and watch the magic happen.
description: Create your own ERC20 cryptocurrency or Meme Tokens in less than a minute. Create with zero development skills by filling out a very short form and watch the magic happen.

author: REWARDS STAKING
title: REWARDS STAKING
shortDescription: Experience the power of Web3 with this cutting-edge Staking Portal solution. You can unlock the potential of letting your digital asset work for you with a secure and reliable staking experience. Stake your wrapped OWCT and Earn upto 0.5% APY.
description: Experience the power of Web3 with this cutting-edge Staking Portal solution. You can unlock the potential of letting your digital asset work for you with a secure and reliable staking experience. Stake your wrapped OWCT and Earn upto 0.5% APY.

author: BLAST CHAIN (L2 - zkEVM)
title: BLAST CHAIN (L2 - zkEVM)
shortDescription: BLAST Chain is a Zero Knowledge Ethereum Virtual Machine (zkEVM) compatible Layer two (L2) Blockchain. It is built on the One World Chain network and uses OWCT as its native currency. The Integration with Ethereum Ecosystem provides users with security and a scalable high-speed access at a much lower cost.
description: BLAST Chain is a Zero Knowledge Ethereum Virtual Machine (zkEVM) compatible Layer two (L2) Blockchain. It is built on the One World Chain network and uses OWCT as its native currency. The Integration with Ethereum Ecosystem provides users with security and a scalable high-speed access at a much lower cost.
